name: part_010
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア3周年記念LIVE】大感謝祭！今日もバカみたいに騒ごう！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [twAfWd7qSWQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song "ユグドラシル" (Yggdrasil).
Performance of the song "アトリエ" (Atelier).

subtitles.original: ここに誰かが
subtitles.english: Someone was here

subtitles.original: 確かにいたと
subtitles.english: For sure, they were

subtitles.original: 古の調べは
subtitles.english: The ancient melody

subtitles.original: 明日も歌うだろう
subtitles.english: Will likely sing tomorrow too

subtitles.original: 海原を行く
subtitles.english: Traveling across the ocean

subtitles.original: 風を追う海賊の譚詩（バラッド）
subtitles.english: The ballad of the wind-chasing pirate

subtitles.original: 荒野を歩む
subtitles.english: Walking through the wasteland

subtitles.original: 誇り高き騎士の頌歌（オード）
subtitles.english: The ode of the proud knight

subtitles.original: 兎を追って落ちた穴には
subtitles.english: In the hole fallen into while chasing a rabbit

subtitles.original: 世界の秘密 記されている
subtitles.english: The world's secrets are recorded

subtitles.original: 過去も未来も幻だから
subtitles.english: Because both past and future are illusions

subtitles.original: いつでも君に会いにいけるよ
subtitles.english: I can go to see you anytime

subtitles.original: 季節は巡りて
subtitles.english: The seasons turn

subtitles.original: 友は先に老いゆき
subtitles.english: Friends grow old before me

subtitles.original: 見守り、見送り
subtitles.english: Watching over, seeing off

subtitles.original: いつも残されて
subtitles.english: Always being the one left behind

subtitles.original: 君の屍を森に還そう
subtitles.english: Let's return your remains to the forest

subtitles.original: いつか世界樹の下で会う
subtitles.english: One day we'll meet under the World Tree

subtitles.original: その時までは さよならだから
subtitles.english: Until then, since it's goodbye

subtitles.original: 一粒の涙を
subtitles.english: A single tear

subtitles.original: 時の水面に消えてゆく名を
subtitles.english: The name fading on the surface of time

subtitles.original: ただ一人だけ覚えていよう
subtitles.english: Let me be the only one to remember it

subtitles.original: ここには君が確かにいたと
subtitles.english: That you were certainly here

subtitles.original: 古の調べは 生きた証を
subtitles.english: The ancient melody, the proof you lived

subtitles.original: 明日も歌うだろう
subtitles.english: Will likely sing tomorrow too

subtitles.original: 世界の果ての
subtitles.english: At the edge of the world

subtitles.original: 大いなる樹を
subtitles.english: To the great tree

subtitles.original: 讃えて歌おう
subtitles.english: Let's sing in praise

subtitles.original: アトリエ
subtitles.english: Atelier

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲:渡辺翔
subtitles.english: Lyrics & Composition: Sho Watanabe

subtitles.original: 保険 言い訳 ばら撒いて
subtitles.english: Scattering insurance and excuses

subtitles.original: 横切った未来振れ 途方に暮れないよう
subtitles.english: So as not to be at a loss with the crossing future

subtitles.original: 未知数が憧れに
subtitles.english: Even if the unknown variables

subtitles.original: 絡まったって奪えはしない
subtitles.english: Get tangled with my yearnings, they can't be stolen

subtitles.original: 空を創ろう 散らかったパズル
subtitles.english: Let's create the sky, even with scattered puzzles

subtitles.original: 組み合わせても 足りない
subtitles.english: It's not enough even if combined

subtitles.original: 壁に写した 知らない世界の
subtitles.english: Of the unknown world projected on the wall

subtitles.original: 前にあった 重い扉開け
subtitles.english: Open the heavy door that was in front

subtitles.original: 忘れてた 少年の絵のように
subtitles.english: Like the boy's painting I'd forgotten

subtitles.original: 温度は高く 微熱まじりで夢話していたい
subtitles.english: I want to talk about dreams with a high temperature and a slight fever

subtitles.original: もう憧憬は 描き飽きて
subtitles.english: I'm tired of drawing yearnings already

subtitles.original: 全部を見るため 空いたアトリエ
subtitles.english: An empty atelier to see everything

subtitles.original: 空いたアトリエ
subtitles.english: Empty atelier

subtitles.original: 帰るアトリエ
subtitles.english: Atelier to return to

subtitles.original: いつかは
subtitles.english: Someday...

subtitles.original: 想像して かきなぐって
subtitles.english: Imagine, scribble it down

subtitles.original: 塗り替えても 外はもっと進んでいた
subtitles.english: Even if I repaint it, the world outside was moving faster

subtitles.original: 不揃いな景色の中
subtitles.english: Amidst the uneven scenery

subtitles.original: 棘が刺さっても 走ってみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try running even if thorns prick me

subtitles.original: 道を創ろう 遠くなるほど
subtitles.english: Let's create a path, as it gets further away

subtitles.original: 細く薄れて 描けない
subtitles.english: It thins and fades, and I can't draw it

subtitles.original: イメージをした 近い未来ぼやけたら
subtitles.english: If the envisioned near future gets blurry

subtitles.original: 重い扉開け
subtitles.english: Open the heavy door

subtitles.original: その心 大胆に染めよう
subtitles.english: Let's dye that heart boldly

subtitles.original: いつかの絵さえ 霞むくらいの夢生み出したい
subtitles.english: I want to create a dream that makes even that old painting pale

subtitles.original: 成果なんて わからない
subtitles.english: I don't know about results or anything

subtitles.original: きっとそれでも 去ったアトリエ
subtitles.english: Surely even so, the atelier I left

subtitles.original: 去ったアトリエ
subtitles.english: The atelier I left

subtitles.original: 僕の...
subtitles.english: My...
